attributes.action: Block even the thought of Sol Campbell coming back to Spurs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After this turncoat did the dirty on Spurs and their millions of fans in 2001, there is currently some rumour going around that he may possible come back to Spurs

This just cannot happen, he is hated like no other player at White Hart Lane

The man has no integrity and is not wanted again by the fans

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
